name: Iudex Gundyr
lore: The unkindled's first trial, risen as a gatekeeper of the Flame.

name: Vordt of the Boreal Valley
lore: An icy beast blocking the road to Lothric.

name: Abyss Watchers
lore: Farron's undead legion doomed to fight themselves to resist the Abyss.

name: Deacons of the Deep
lore: A collective of clerics who worship the deep dark.

name: High Lord Wolnir
lore: A skeletal tyrant dragged into the Abyss.

name: Pontiff Sulyvahn
lore: The cruel ruler of Irithyll, wielding twin blades and shadow.

name: Aldrich, Devourer of Gods
lore: Once a cleric, now a sludge of divine remains.

name: Yhorm the Giant
lore: A Lord of Cinder with a tragic burden.

name: Dancer of the Boreal Valley
lore: A corrupted swordmaster guarding the path to the castle.

name: Dragonslayer Armour
lore: Haunted armor of a dragonslayer defending the archives.

name: Lorian and Lothric, Twin Princes
lore: The crippled prince and his brother who reject their duty to the Flame.

name: Nameless King
lore: Once heir to Gwyn, the god of war who sided with dragons. Cast out, he returns wielding storm and death from above.
